How to Install lure-of-the-temptress on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • lure-of-the-temptress

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install lure-of-the-temptress on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing lure-of-the-temptress on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall lure-of-the-temptress in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install lure-of-the-temptress, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install lure-of-the-temptress Using apt

To install lure-of-the-temptress in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install lure-of-the-temptress using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install lure-of-the-temptress

The installation of lure-of-the-temptress might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install lure-of-the-temptress Using apt-get

To install lure-of-the-temptress using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install lure-of-the-temptress.

sudo apt-get -y install lure-of-the-temptress

Install lure-of-the-temptress Using Synaptic

To install lure-of-the-temptress using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install lure-of-the-temptress on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for lure-of-the-temptress. This will display the lure-of-the-temptress package in the package window, now to install lure-of-the-temptress, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the lure-of-the-temptress package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of lure-of-the-temptress.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install lure-of-the-temptress Using aptitude

To install lure-of-the-temptress on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of lure-of-the-temptress.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install lure-of-the-temptress using the command aptitude install lure-of-the-temptress.

sudo aptitude -y install lure-of-the-temptress

How to Upgrade lure-of-the-temptress on debian

If you want to upgrade the lure-of-the-temptress package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade lure-of-the-temptress using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade lure-of-the-temptress to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade lure-of-the-temptress.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade lure-of-the-temptress sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade lure-of-the-temptress

Upgrade lure-of-the-temptress using Aptitude

To upgrade lure-of-the-temptress using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade lure-of-the-temptress.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade lure-of-the-temptress

Upgrade lure-of-the-temptress using Synaptic

To upgrade lure-of-the-temptress using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for lure-of-the-temptress, now right-click lure-of-the-temptress, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade lure-of-the-temptress just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall lure-of-the-temptress on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall lure-of-the-temptress from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just lure-of-the-temptress, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove lure-of-the-temptress

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of lure-of-the-temptress

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of lure-of-the-temptress you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge lure-of-the-temptress

Remove lure-of-the-temptress using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall lure-of-the-temptress using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for lure-of-the-temptress, right-click the lure-of-the-temptress package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall lure-of-the-temptress click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install lure-of-the-temptress on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade lure-of-the-temptress using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of lure-of-the-temptress then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
